posts.title: 口琴入门思维导图
posts.excerpt: 此处整理收集口琴入门相关的信息导航图
posts.text: 此处整理收集口琴入门相关的信息导航图 1. 作者：筱赟 function loadJsonData(urls) { var url = urls; $.ajax({ processData: true, data: "", timeout: 60000, dataType: "json", crossDomain: true, type: "POST", url: url, success: function (data) { if (typeof data != null && typeof data != "undefined") { return data; } }, error: function (result, textStatus) { return null; } }); } var mymap1 = loadJsonData("https://shinehua2017.github.io/mappingdata/mymap-1.json"); console.log(JSON.stringify(mymap1)); if (typeof mymap1 != null && typeof mymap1 != "undefined") { echarts.util.each(mymap1.children, function (datum, index) { index % 2 === 0 && (datum.collapsed = true); }); } // 基于准备好的dom，初始化echarts实例 var myChart = echarts.init(document.getElementById('echarts2067')); // 指定图表的配置项和数据 var option = { tooltip: { trigger: 'item', triggerOn: 'mousemove' }, series: [ { type: 'tree', data: [mymap1], top: '1%', left: '7%', bottom: '1%', right: '20%', symbolSize: 7, label: { normal: { position: 'left', verticalAlign: 'middle', align: 'right', fontSize: 9 } }, leaves: { label: { normal: { position: 'right', verticalAlign: 'middle', align: 'left' } } }, expandAndCollapse: true, animationDuration: 550, animationDurationUpdate: 750 } ] }); }; // 使用刚指定的配置项和数据显示图表。 myChart.setOption(option);
